original_text: One day John told Herod, the ruler, that it was wrong for him to marry Herodias. Before that, she had been the wife of Herod's brother. John also told Herod that he had done many other bad things.
korean_text: 분봉 왕 헤롯은 그의 동생의 아내 헤로디아의 일과 또 자기가 행한 모든 악한 일로 말미암아 요한에게 책망을 받고

sentences.original_text: One day John told Herod, the ruler,
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 요한은 헤롯 통치자에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: that it was wrong for him to marry Herodias.
Before that, she had been the wife
that he had done many other bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 다른 많은 나쁜 일들을 했다고
